channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

Report X-2023070954

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS REMOVE FROM UNLOAD TRAILER BY AN MANAGER PUT ON A CART THEN BROUGHT TO HAZMAT CAGE DescribePack: DENTS IN THE SIDEWALLS OF THE JERRICANS WEAKENED THE SEEMS CAUSING LEAK DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PUT IN TO A HAZMAT TOTE WITH BAG

item.title: Report X-2023070951
item.description:
Report X-2023070951

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-10
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The driver had it loaded on his truck. During his day, he found it and it had internal leakage with a strong odor. He bagged it up with multiple bags until he was able to return to the station. DescribePack: There were dents and obvious crushing evidence. It seems clear it had been mishandled at some point in its journey, possibly multiple points. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: placed in multiple bags

item.title: Report X-2023070710
item.description:
Report X-2023070710

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023070710 SequenceEvent: Pkg was loaded improperly allowing contents to leak wetting the contents and carton. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin. 2. X-2023070711 SequenceEvent: Pkg was loaded improperly allowing contents to leak wetting the contents and carton. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin. 3. X-2023070712 SequenceEvent: Pkg was loaded improperly allowing contents to leak wetting the contents and carton. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin. 4. X-2023070714 SequenceEvent: Pkg was loaded improperly allowing contents to leak wetting the contents and carton. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in line Hazmat bin. 5. X-2023070715 SequenceEvent: Pkg was loaded improperly allowing contents to leak wetting the contents and carton. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed on low level slow moving conveyor. 6. X-2023070716 SequenceEvent: Pkg was loaded improperly allowing contents to leak wetting the contents and carton. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed on low level slow moving conveyor. 7. X-2023070717 SequenceEvent: Pkg was loaded improperly allowing contents to leak wetting the contents and carton. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed on low level slow moving conveyor. 8. X-2023070719 SequenceEvent: Pkg was loaded improperly allowing contents to leak wetting the contents and carton. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. item.title: Report X-2023070707
item.description:
Report X-2023070707

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A leaking bottle wet the carton with no Hazmat markings and no orientation arrows. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in an unauthorized and unlined plaxtic bin and sent to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Cap missing from 1 x 1 gal plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in plastic bin.

item.title: Report X-2023070611
item.description:
Report X-2023070611

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-08T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer and sent to overhead sorter. Wet package was removed from workflow at van line and retrieved by QA member at Manager's request. Package was placed in plastic tote. Liquid treated as Hazardous in absence of SDS. DescribePack: One of the caps came off package, internal leakage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of flammable liquid.

item.title: Report X-2023070636
item.description:
Report X-2023070636

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-30
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The wet pkg was found to have a strong odor of gasoline. The pkg was removed from system flow and taken to the QA area where it was later transferred to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. Gasoline from the gasoline powered lawn mower in the unmarked wet carton had leaked a small amount of gasoline staining the top of the carton. Contents and carton are also wet from the item being packed in the rain or possibly a leaking trailer. DescribePack: A loose gasoline filler cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed on a rolling cart.
